message_board/config.js Configuration File 
{
        
        "mb" : {
                "media" : "/media",
                "root" : "",
                "connection_string" : "sqlite3:db=mb.db;@pool_size=10"
                //"connection_string" : "mysql:database=test;user=root;password=root;@pool_size=10"
        },
        "service" : {
                "api" : "http",
                "port" : 8080
        },
        "http" : {
                "script" : "/mb",
                "rewrite" : [
                        { "regex" : "/media(/.*)?", "pattern" : "$0" },
                        { "regex" : "/favion\\.ico", "pattern" : "$0" },
                        { "regex" : ".*" , "pattern" : "/mb$0" }
                ]
        },
        "views" : {
                 "paths" : [ "./" ],
                 "skins" : [ "simple" ],
        },
        "file_server" : {
                "enable" : true,
                "document_root" : "../"
        },
        "session" : {
                "expire" : "renew",
                "timeout" : 604800,
                "location" : "client",
                "client" : {
                        "hmac" : "sha1",
                        "hmac_key" : "232074faa0fd37de20858bf8cd0a7d04"
                }
        },
        "cache" : {
                "backend" : "thread_shared",
                "limit" : 100,
        },
        "security" : {
                "csrf" : {
                        "enable" : true,
                        "exposed" : true
                }
        },
        "localization" : {
                "messages" : {
                        "paths" : [ "./locale" ],
                        "domains" : [ "mb" ]
                },
                "locales" : [ 
                        "en_US.UTF-8",
                        "he_IL.UTF-8"
                ]
        }
}
